content: Hi All, I have been using the Drug Formulary capability statement, and found that List had no SearchParameters listed under the List resource in the CapabilityStatement https://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/davinci-pdex-formulary/CapabilityStatement-usdf-server.html whereas the MedicationKnowledge resource contains the expected queries and Search parameters. is the Capability Statement correct?
